    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    object.Bomb
    The object.Bomb class represents an explosive object that can be placed on the game board.
    model.Boomberman
    The model.Boomberman class contains the model method that runs the Bomberman-Inspired game.
    model.DestructibleTile
    The model.DestructibleTile class represents a tile that initially blocks movement but can be destroyed by a bomb explosion.
    model.GameBoard
    Represents the game board for Bomberman, composed of a 2D array of model.Tile objects.
    model.Hero
    Represents the player-controlled hero in the game board.
    model.IndestructibleTile
    The model.IndestructibleTile class represents a permanent wall or barrier that cannot be destroyed by bombs and never becomes walkable.
    model.NormalBomb
    The model.NormalBomb class represents a standard stationary bomb that explodes in place after its countdown reaches zero.
    model.Tile
    The model.Tile class serves as the base class for all terrain types on the game board.
    model.WalkableTile
    Represents a tile that the model.Hero can walk on.
